note:
Queer, liberal nerd from Norway living in Germany (yay Schengen! 🇪🇺). Usually known as @lognseth on the internet.

Outside of work I‘m an avid reader and movie nerd, I also enjoy cooking, gaming, hiking and craft beer (although I’m trying to drink less).

At work I’m a DevOps & Cloud Architect with a particular focus on Azure and Kubernetes. I thrive in situations where I can be an accelerator to achieve cool things for customers and partners.

@pm is my partner-in-crime
